item.title: How do I make a bow atack from distance?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Add

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 3; UseBow = true; }
Under EVERY

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 3; UseBow = true; }
Your delays will most likely be different.
There’s like 4 of each of those.

Then find the 4 codes like this:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7622 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 3; UseBow = true; }
And add a || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 11785) at the end of each of those.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a bow atack from distance?

item.title: How do I make a bow atack from distance?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 839 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 841 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4827 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 7622 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 845 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 847 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 849 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 851 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 853 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 855 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 857) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 3; UseBow = true; }
Also those. Add your bow
857 || playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == ####)

item.title: How do I make a bow atack from distance?
item.dc:creator: @P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut `Lewk_
item.description:
@P_I_M_P_3_D_Tut wrote:

depends how far?
like 1 sq?
2?
3?
4?
5?
or do you want him to atk from where he is?
If so add:
teleportToX = absX;
teleportToY = absY;

Read full topic
item.source: How do I make a bow atack from distance?

item.title: How do I make a bow atack from distance?
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4214) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 3; UseBow = true; }

Find all…8?..of those, and under it add

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == IDOFNEWBOW) { PkingDelay = 5; wepdelay = 3; UseBow = true; }

Note: Your delays will not be the same.

Read full topic
